title: Bad FPS
body: So if i'm playing my FPS will be around 7-15 the whole match which causes me to fail horribly in game, i have 20 GB of RAM a Intel Core i5-2300 CPU 2.80GHz, windows 10 64 bit and a sapphire r9 280x graphics card. It doesn't matter if i play on very high or low it will still be around 7 to 15 does anyone know what I can do to fix this?

replies.body: There could be a driver issue, bad game filie, or something else causing your frames to drop like that.  My suggestion wouuld be to go over the steps int he [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide not only to tune things up, but also help rule out some possibilities.  Test it out in a custom game and let me know the results.
